Title: Journal Page IV
Text:
(The edges of the yellowed page are charred)

Day ██.

Our search stretched on and on, and all we found in the storeroom was a worn-out weapon schematic, probably left behind by the Order. Silently, we gathered anything of worth, not speaking a word about the relic. No one needed to—everyone knew. This quest has failed, and all our sacrifice has been in vain. But I don't accept it. The Order must have hidden something here on this island. Where is it?

(Rushed handwriting follows as if penned in great urgency)

Those damned TDs are coming for us. It's only a matter of time before they break through. But I've finally found it.

How absurd! The relic was always here, right before our eyes.

At the grand altar of ██, circled by towering Tacetites.

The howls are drawing closer. Forgive me.
